abstract.p: Margeotes/Fertitta & Partners acquires majority stake in Chinnici Direct and merges it into its direct marketing division, Margeotes/Fertitta & Pavlika (S)

block.p: Margeotes/Fertitta & Partners in New York said yesterday that it had acquired a majority stake in Chinnici Direct in New York, a direct marketing agency, and merged it into its direct marketing division, Margeotes/Fertitta & Pavlika. Terms were not disclosed.

The combined unit, called Pavlika Chinnici Direct, will have 60 employees and billings estimated at $60 million from clients like Chase Manhattan Bank. Michael Chinnici, 42, president and chief executive at Chinnici Direct, becomes chief executive and chief operating officer at Pavlika Chinnici Direct; Holly Pavlika, 45, president at Margeotes/Fertitta & Pavlika, becomes president and executive creative director. Margeotes/Fertitta is part of the Maxxcom unit of the MDC Corporation.
